price: ''Hamd, iyice yaşlanmış iken bana İsmail’i ve İshak’ı veren Allah’a mahsustur. Şüphesiz Rabbim duayı işitendir.''
arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي وَهَبَ لِي عَلَى ٱلۡكِبَرِ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَسَمِيعُ ٱلدُّعَآءِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī wahaba lī ʿalā al-kibari is'māʿīla wa-is'ḥāqa inna rabbī lasamīʿu al-duʿāi
